ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) package refrigerated pie crust dough
1 large apple - peeled, cored and sliced

cookingTips: Slice apple thinly for even cooking in pie
Layer peanut butter, apple, and cheese evenly on pie crust
Fold edges of crust carefully to seal filling inside
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is an unusual savory-sweet combination. Explain that cheddar and peanut butter are complementary flavors and suggest tasting a small piece first to ensure preference.
